name: Cookie Man Theater
description:
Cookie Man Theater

 is a game when you go to a candy city there is a Childs are gone and you have you have to see what Happened The Childs

How To Play :

    W
A S D : Move
E : Interact
Left Mouse Click : Send The Robot
Right Mouse Click : Make Robot Follow You
Left Shift : Run
Mouse : Look up and down and right and left
 
THIS IS A SHORT GAME
 
Playtime : 10 min

If there is any bug tell in the Comments
